GET /api/games.description: Serves an array of all games, can be sorted by various queries

GET /api/games/:app_ID.description: Serves an object containing the game with the passed app_ID, that being the ID from Steam (i.e. 1174180 = Red Dead Redemption 2)

GET /api/games/:app_ID/links.description: Serves an object containing a link to the first video on the Steam profile of the requested game, and the first 3 images
